item.title: Moments: Breakfast With Champions
item.description: Hayden: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cfksYTFzY5M Point is made was cricket was a big threatre for him, and live broadcasted threatre. He gave his performance and fine. I didn’t saw cricket or any game on those lines before. He made it feel like art form. Brett Lee: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl0Wc6TaokI&t Pain brett lee went through while bowling: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl0Wc6TaokI&t=14m0s https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl0Wc6TaokI&t=15m26s Michael Holding: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fbKkJO1OEc4 Really nice to hear his opinion and found someone who synchronizes with my thought process.

item.title: Video: A glimpse into ancient indian astronomy
item.description: Astrology has always intrigued me, specifically indian style of astrology, have heard a lot about it. Lunar calendar and rituals and traditions around it always facinate me a lot. I have some longing for it. Haven’t worked on it much, but this video again brings those question back to me. Path for me is language first, will have to learn sanskrit first, then i would have lot of venues open to me.
